name: First Person Invaders
description:
A classic with a twist! (This game is a submission for GameJam Argentina's [Re]Make Jam )

Defeat the invading aliens as usual, but this time, you also control your shots!

Move your ship with the Arrows, while you shoot with Space and steer and control the bullet's speed with WASD.

What will be your highest score???

Made by: Icefox
